title: Learning Postgresql (npgsql), Entity Framework 7 (EF Core), and ASP.NET MVC 6
content: Finally, Entity Framework has support for databases other than SQL Server, and as many of us know, MVC 6 is cross-platform. This means we .NET devs can now launch our ASP.NET applications on a Linux server, saving huge on server costs and giving us some freedom. EF7 now supports SQL Server, Postg
